text: Rijsoord is a village in the province of South Holland, the Netherlands. It belongs to the municipality of Ridderkerk and was a municipality until 1855.Plaatsengids.nl (in Dutch) Rijsoord has 3,005 people living there in 2022.AlleCijfers.nl (in Dutch) During World War II, the Dutch army surrendered to Nazi Germany in Rijsoord on May 15, 1940.TracesOfWar == Related pages == * German invasion of the Netherlands == References == Category:19th-century disestablishments in the Netherlands Category:Settlements in South Holland Category:Former municipalities of South Holland Category:Ridderkerk
title: Rijsoord
